name: Always Fresh
description:
A Game Jam of 10 days with the theme decay where your food expire and you must buy your ingredients with caution

Q/E - Rotate the camera

WASD - Move the player

R - See all recipe

Esc - Exit

Made by James Gagnon(Skalkevai) & Marilie Michaud (Mixie)

3D Model by Synty Studio & Elodie
